content.question: Which of the following technological examples is best used to compare the effects of local-scale and global-scale political challenges to state sovereignty?

choices.label: Laptop computers used by aid agencies in nation-building
Social media Web sites supporting supranational organizations
Internet filters restricting the spread of globalization
Cell phone use weakening corrupt governments
Satellite image analysis contributing to devolution

content.answer: Cell phone use weakening corrupt governments

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Compare geographic characteristics and processes at various scales.
